title: colors
description: The `colors` object in Pure Data functions as a versatile color picker and converter. It allows users to select colors via a GUI, convert between various color formats like RGB, Hex, HSL, HSV, CMYK, and grayscale, and output them in different representations, including formats suitable for Pd's GUI objects and Data Structures. This object is particularly useful for managing and applying color properties within Pure Data patches and abstractions.
